note: I am new to mastedon, so i am not on here super frequently so I apologize if I do not get to messages or requests right away. I am only one person who experiences chronic fatigue and chronic pain which makes it hard for me to participate in the liberation movements the way I would want to. It also makes it hard for me to work to support myself, but rest-assured, I am doing what I can. I feel so much love for all of you even if I don't know you personally. All humans deserve quality of life
